url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Example Aggregate

sections.feats: Alertness, Improved Initiative, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, TechnologistB

sections.name: Special Abilities
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Example Aggregate/Security Mannequin/Special Abilities

sections.body: The synthetic flesh and hair of a security mannequin give it a +8 bonus on Disguise checks to appear human (but not to impersonate a specific human).
sections.name: False Flesh
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Example Aggregate/Security Mannequin/Special Abilities/False Flesh

sections.weaknesses: vulnerable to critical hits and electricity
sections.name: Security Mannequin
sections.skills: Bluff +10, Diplomacy +10, Disguise +3 (+11 to appear human), Intimidate +10, Knowledge (engineering, geography) +10, Knowledge (local) +6, Perception +16, Profession (soldier) +11, Sense Motive +16
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Example Aggregate/Security Mannequin

name: Example Aggregate
